thread.title: Tillerson says goodbye, to step down March 31

title: Tillerson says goodbye, to step down March 31
text:
Tillerson says goodbye, to step down March 31 2:54pm EDT - 01:24 
U.S. Secretary of State Rex Tillerson, who was fired by President Donald Trump on Tuesday, said he was delegating all of his responsibilities to the State Department's No. 2 official and that he would leave office at the end of the month. Rough Cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
